description.en:
Areum has fallen into a strange world called 'Soltera' after a car accident.  
She is mistaken for a vampire because of her hair color, and she is sold to a Duke’s house by a slave trader.  
The identity of Millard Travis the master of the Duke’s house that bought her is the one and only vampire in the world!  
  
Desperate to survive in any way, Areum becomes Millard's direct servant, vowing to serve him as her master.  
Areum tries to belly up on Millard day by day and his attitude starts to change.  
  
—  
Areum ha caído en un mundo extraño llamado 'Soltera' después de un accidente automovilístico. La confunden con un vampiro por el color de su cabello, y un traficante de esclavos la vende a la casa de un duque. ¡La identidad de Millard Travis, el maestro de la casa del duque que la compró, es el único vampiro del mundo! Desesperado por sobrevivir de cualquier manera, Areum se convierte en el sirviente directo de Millard, jurando servirle como su maestro. Areum trata de arremeter contra Millard día tras día y su actitud comienza a cambiar.

---

[Original Novel](https://ridibooks.com/v2/Detail?id=2901000201)  
Official English: [Lezhin](https://www.lezhin.com/en/comic/maidnvampire), [Tappytoon](https://www.tappytoon.com/series/maidnvamp/1), [NetComics](https://www.netcomics.com/comic/157), [MangaToon](https://mangatoon.mobi/en/detail/30605), [Manta](https://manta.net/series/1192), [Pocket Comics](https://www.comico.io/pocket-comics)
